tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE CommunicationsLog (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_id INT NOT NULL,
  communication_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  communication_details TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationsLog (
  communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  customer_name VARCHAR(255),
  communication_date DATE,
  communication_type VARCHAR(50),
  message TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE CommunicationsLog (
    communication_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    update_type VARCHAR(50),
    communication_date TIMESTAMP,
    communication_text TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Loans (
    loan_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    customer_id INT,
    loan_amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    loan_status VARCHAR(20),
    loan_approval_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE LoanUpdates (
    update_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    loan_id INT,
    update_type VARCHAR(50),
    updated_date TIMESTAMP,
    update_details TEXT
);
